```{r, include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.dpi = 300, 
  collapse = TRUE, 
  comment = "#>",
  fig.asp = 0.618,
  fig.width = 6,
  out.width = "80%"
  )
```

  - change legend title
  - change background
  - change spacing
  - change font size of axis labels
  - change font size of legend
